reviewText: I remember typing intensely, waiting for my Apple IIc to respond, and then pounding furiously on the keyboard in response, even though nothing in the game happened until I pressed "Return." Infocom had it right: the most powerful graphic processor was the one between your ears.  This is an awesome documentary, and I feel a sense of loss for the succeeding generations who never experienced this feeling. In a different Infocom game, and for the record, I got the f#[king Babel Fish and the T-shirt to brag about it.
